Description.Name: To Be Continued
Description.Details:
Congratulations...!

If you're seeing this you have entered into the dark machinations and intrigue of the Indri Consortium, the mysterious Mr. Smith and his 'Fixer'and survived...so far.

You have rescued a Countess and a Governor, several tons of top quality beef, made several enemies and fostered Allies and made a little money along the way.

This is just a pause in the frantic pace of what is 'The Baron's War' and I hope you'll be here to the end.

Be on the lookout for the continuation... 'Operation Deep Strike'.

Description.Name: Continue...
Description.Details:
This Flashpoint it a collaberation of many people. Fisrt and foremost XyerX for a wonderful remastering of the HBS BattleTech game, , FrostRaptor who provided Contract launching flexibility and the modding community as whole. If I have miss mentioning any one specific it is totally my omission. I don't get a lot of space in here to type stuff.

XeryX for XAI - Battletech.
Cwolf, for his amazing Mission Control, Extended Conversation and ConverseteK and patience to answer my stupid questions.
FrostRaptor for his Utilities and Maprandomizer
Amechwarrior - who first encouraged me to see what else is possible.
.
.
.
.
.
I don't have enough room to mention you all - but you know.

To Tex of the BPL - The 'voice' of the Innershpere - I salute you.

And finally, those who are reading this - you, who have spent your valuable time playing my Flashpoints, I hope you find them enjoyable and challenging. 

Hang on, as the ride is not yet over.
